full_summary:
================

## Solicitation for Elastic Platinum Node Subscription

Shared Services Canada (SSC) is soliciting proposals for the purchase of an Elastic Platinum Node subscription and related technical specifications. The solicitation is for the Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP).

**Solicitation Details:**

* Solicitation Name: SSC Elastic Platinum Node Subscription for RCMP- Amendment 001
* Reference Number: SSC-24-00026644:T
* Solicitation Number: BPM021484/26644
* Publication Date: 2024-06-27
* Tender Closing Date: 2024-07-11T02:00:00
* Amendment Number: 1

**Procurement Details:**

* Procurement Category: Goods and Services (GD)
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Regions of Opportunity: Canada
* Regions of Delivery: National Capital Region (NCR)

**Additional Information:**

* Guard Services Integrated Code (GSIN): N7030AG - COMPUTER SOFTWARE, OFFICE AUTOMATION, DOCUMENT MANAGEMENT, MAIL, NETWORKS, PUBLISHING, SPREADSHEETS, TYPSETTING, WORD PROCESSING - MICROCOMPUTERS ONLY
* Featured Product or Service: Elastic Platinum Node subscription
* Subscription includes technical specifications and requirements.

## Bidding Instructions:

To participate in this solicitation, potential bidders must register in the SSC Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) supplier portal. Once registered, bidders can view and access solicitations, submit responses, and receive updates and amendments regarding solicitations. To register, please go to [https://supplier-fournisseur-sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/usr/login](https://supplier-fournisseur-sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/usr/login) and click Register Now.

## Contact Information:

For inquiries regarding this solicitation, please contact Raiyane Benchekroun at (613) 324-4061 or (613) 960-6007 (fax). Email address is not available.
